alert.note: Alert for Houghton (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 1:10PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Houghton County through 145 PM EDT... At 108 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Redridge, or 10 miles west of Houghton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail and wind gusts up to 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hancock around 120 PM EDT. South Range around 125 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Houghton, Dollar Bay and Houghton County Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
